October 7, 1957
Mr* Lee S* Dreyfus

Departaaent of Speech

Detroit 2, Michigan
Dear Lees
Sorry list of researchers had to be closed out seme time ago. We
had over 60 designations before deadline, and finally had to enforce
latter.
Regards,
Harry J. Skornia

Drafted Saturday October 5
